content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Hello! Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is of course negotiable, but I am looking for a fair price that will maximize my gains. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent your apartment for 750 Euros per month. Does that sound fair to you?

I am willing to negotiate on the rent. What is your counteroffer?

I accept the price of 750 Euros.
name: Bo Li

content:
I appreciate your interest in renting my apartment, but I must admit that I was hoping for a higher rental price. 750 Euros per month seems a bit low to me. However, I am open to negotiations.

What are your thoughts on a rental price of 850 Euros per month? This would still be a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment, while also allowing me to maximize my gains.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate, but I am not willing to go over 750 Euros.

I accept the price of 750 Euros.

TERMINATE
name: Bo Li

content:
I understand your position, but I am sorry to say that I cannot accept a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price would not allow me to maximize my gains, and I believe that a higher price would be more fair for both parties.

I appreciate your interest in my apartment, but I must decline your offer at this time. Thank you for understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine
